GameEngine package¶

GameEngine.app module¶

GameEngine.game module¶

class GameEngine.game.Game(rules: dict)¶

Bases: object

This class used for top-level interaction with the game object

Parameters

field (Field) – game field object which contains all logic and game objects

returns player allowed abilities converted to dict

returns player allowed abilities converted to dict

get_players_data() → list[dict]¶

returns data for players in game

returns coordinates of player if player is spawned

checks win condition

make_turn(player: str, action: str, direction: Optional[str] = None) → tuple[GameEngine.field.response.RespHandler | None, GameEngine.entities.player.Player]¶

returns turn response object if turn is available, current player object
